definition: unspecified period/in the indefinite future/no fixed time/indefinite sentence (i.e. life imprisonment)
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
life imprisonment
far in the indefinite future (idiom); so far away it seems forever
to meet again at unspecified date/meeting postponed indefinitely
to part for an unspecified period/to take leave from indefinitely

sentences.english: His punishment of death was commuted to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他被從死刑減爲無期徒刑。

sentences.english: He has said she faces a possible life sentence.
sentences.chinese: 維曾表示，田文華可能會被判無期徒刑。

sentences.english: Typically gw gold, such sentences are commuted to life in prison.
sentences.chinese: 通常情況下，這種判決都會減刑爲無期徒刑。

sentences.english: Jean got life imprisonment for killing the policeman.
sentences.chinese: 簡因殺害那個警察被判處無期徒刑。

sentences.english: But no U.S.-Taiwan free trade agreement is pending.
sentences.chinese: 但是，美臺籤自由貿易協定還遙遙無期。

sentences.english: The court doomed the accused to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判決被告無期徒刑。

sentences.english: His punishment was commuted from life imprisonment to twenty-five years' imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他的無期徒刑減輕爲二十五年徒刑。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court automatically reviews life imprisonment and death sentences.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院自動審查無期徒刑和死刑。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are especially serious, the offender shall be sentenced to life imprisonment, and concurrently be sentenced to confiscation of property.
sentences.chinese: 情節特別嚴重的，處無期徒刑，並處沒收財產。

sentences.english: On August 21 this year, Wang was sentenced to life in prison for fraud.
sentences.chinese: 今年8月，王細牛因欺詐罪被判無期徒刑。

sentences.english: Two other men who sold tainted protein powder, Zhang Yanzhang and Xue Jianzhong, were sentenced to prison for life, the state-run news agency, Xinhua, reported.
sentences.chinese: 出售有毒蛋白粉的張豔章和薛建忠被判無期徒刑。

sentences.english: Araya is on the brink of losing it all and is doubtful that he will ever return to Wall Street.
sentences.chinese: 至於有沒有重歸華爾街的希望，那就遙遙無期了。

sentences.english: Alucard: Farewell then. We'll not meet again.
The charge of throwing corrosive liquid with an intent to injure carries a maximum life sentence.
sentences.chinese: 意圖淋潑腐蝕性液體，造成傷害罪最高可判無期徒刑。

sentences.english: His punishment has been commuted from death to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他的刑罰已從死刑減爲無期徒刑。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are serious, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than ten years or life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 情節嚴重的，處十年以上有期徒刑或者無期徒刑。

invaluable/priceless
